attributes.action: force David Miliband to apologise to the peoples of Poland and Latvia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to force David Miliband to apologise to the peoples of Poland and Latvia.

rejection.details: Please explain the context of your petition and resubmit. At present it is unclear why you think David Miliband should apologise.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
